name: DeepVeinThrombosisICD10CMCodesForAEReporting
title: Deep Vein Thrombosis, ICD10CM codes for AE reporting
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Deep vein thrombosis definition of ICD10CM diagnosis codes, for potential identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Condition/Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Deep vein thrombosis ICM10CM diagnosis codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Superficial veins and non-deep vein codes are excluded.)
